# spark机器学习算法研究和源码分析

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/spark-jiqi-xuexi-suanfa-yanjiu-he-yuanma-fenxi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/spark-jiqi-xuexi-suanfa-yanjiu-he-yuanma-fenxi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install spark-jiqi-xuexi-suanfa-yanjiu-he-yuanma-fenxi
spark-jiqi-xuexi-suanfa-yanjiu-he-yuanma-fenxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g spark-jiqi-xuexi-suanfa-yanjiu-he-yuanma-fenxi
spark-jiqi-xuexi-suanfa-yanjiu-he-yuanma-fenxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
